headline: Bitcoin Slips, Coinbase Stock Drops as Market's Friday Ills Hit Crypto
summary: A complex mixture of news and data is hitting stocks to close out the week. One side effect: a drag on crypto-related investments, which not long ago were riding high on big-picture optimism.

headline: Regulators Handed the Crypto Industry a 5-Year Head Start. Can Wall Street Catch Up?

headline: These are top 10 stocks traded on the Robinhood UK platform in July
summary: Investing.com -- Tesla topped the list of the most-traded stocks on the Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) UK platform in July, according to data from the broker, released on Friday.

headline: Brokerage, Wealth Management Stocks Tumble on Darkening Economic Outlook
summary: Shares of Robinhood, LPL Financial, and other brokerage and wealth management companies tumbled Friday morning after the monthly jobs report added to investors’ concerns about economic growth.

headline: Robinhood Markets And 2 Growth Stocks With Significant Insider Ownership
summary: As July 2025 comes to a close, the U.S. stock market has experienced a mixed performance with major indexes like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq posting gains for the third consecutive month, despite recent volatility driven by fluctuating tech earnings and economic data. In such an environment, investors often look towards growth companies with high insider ownership as these stocks can offer unique insights into corporate confidence and potential resilience against broader market uncertainties.

headline: Coinbase shares fall 11.2% after profit drop
summary: Coinbase's Frankfurt-listed shares tumbled 11% on Friday, a day after the cryptocurrency exchange reported a drop in adjusted profit for the second quarter, as gains in subscription and services revenue were offset by weaker trading activity. Shares in the company fell almost 7% in after-hours trading on Thursday following the release of its results.

raw.headline: Coinbase shares fall 11.2% after profit drop
raw.summary: Coinbase's Frankfurt-listed shares tumbled 11% on Friday, a day after the cryptocurrency exchange reported a drop in adjusted profit for the second quarter, as gains in subscription and services revenue were offset by weaker trading activity. Shares in the company fell almost 7% in after-hours trading on Thursday following the release of its results.
